title: 7.2.2 Implement S3Scanner with rules
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Implement S3 security scanner with public access, encryption, versioning, logging rules.

## Rules
- S3_001: Public Access Enabled (Critical)
- S3_002: No Default Encryption (High)
- S3_003: Versioning Disabled (Medium)
- S3_004: Access Logging Disabled (Medium)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/s3.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/rules/s3_rules.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
